author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

* Add new MutableMemberChecker to test for modifying `mutable` member variable inside `const` member function (directly via assignment or indirectly via calling non-const member function of that mutable member), and also to report "useless" mutables - i.e. mutables that are not modified in any `const` method.
* Rename MutableMemberChecker to PublicMutableChecker and only look for `mutable` member variables with `public` access
* Remove old makefiles, add script to test llvm analyzer using files in `test` directory

#### PR validation:

Bot tests + `run_static_checks.sh` in local project
title: Update CMS LLVM Analyzers
